text:
### SCENE 11 – Temple & Steps  

_After pooja._

**Gayatri:** Annaya, *prasadham*. Pradakshanalu ki velli vasta. _exits_  

**Niha:** So… chusina-ventane nacchindhi; propose cheyyadaniki bayapadi *friend* annav…  
**Arjun:** Exactly. Bayapadi ani kadhu, ee madhya “love at first sight” ante maturity, compatibility ani class peekutunnaru mee ammayilu.  
_Niha laughs._

_While walking down the long steps:_

**Niha:** Script lo heroine dialogues levu.  
**Arjun:** Asalu heroine ae ledhu, *trial short film* kadha…  
**Niha:** Free advice—short film ki *ammayi andam*, assalu **ammayi-e andam**.  

_Hero stops mid-step, pondering whether to change his decision._

<!-- lang: en+te | end Scene 11 -->
